item.title: FD Spiced Dahl
item.description: 326 calories Fry 60g chopped onion in 1 teaspoon olive oil with a clove of crushed garlic and 1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh ginger. Cook for 5 minutes Add half pint water, 50g dried, washed red lentils, a pinch of Cumin Coriander Turmeric Cayenne pepper Salt and pepper. Boil for 20 minutes or until lentils are tender. Serve with 2 poppadoms and 2 tablespoons of fat-free natural yogurt.
